name: Laser-DBM
full_name: Dynamic Bayesian Network for Visual Inspection of Laser Surface Heat Treatment
paper: Dynamic Bayesian Network-Based Anomaly Detection for In-Process Visual Inspection of Laser Surface Heat Treatment.
description: Dynamic Bayesian networks (DBNs) are used to represent the temporal characteristics of the normal process. The methods is incorporated in a larger classifcation framework that detects anomalies in recorded video sequences that have been preprocessed using a clustering-based method for feature subset selection.
bibtex: @inbook{inbook,author = {Ogbechie, Alberto and Diaz Rozo, Javier and Larranaga, Pedro and Bielza, Concha},year = {2017},month = {11},pages = {17-24},title = {Dynamic Bayesian Network-Based Anomaly Detection for In-Process Visual Inspection of Laser Surface Heat Treatment},isbn = {978-3-662-53805-0},doi = {10.1007/978-3-662-53806-7_3}}
